name: Adaptable
ability: Once per game, during the night, you may choose any characteristic, you become that characteristic.

name: Alert
ability: During the night, once per game, when you‚Äôre chosen by another player, you learn who they are, even if their ability would kill you.

name: Empathetic
ability: You start knowing how many other players are Psychic.

name: Forthright
ability: All players know who you are.

name: Intuitive
ability: Each night, you learn who the narrator thinks you should speak with the most.

name: Knowledgeable
ability: You start knowing whether a role of your choice is in play or not.

name: Meticulous
ability: You learn if you become malfunctioning. This ability can not malfunction.

name: Obnoxious
ability: The first person to choose you with an ability becomes malfunctioning.

name: Observant
ability: You start knowing how many of your neighbours wake up due to an ability of theirs during the first night.

name: Persevering
ability: The first time you are killed by another player, you survive.

name: Resourceful
ability: If the Cohesion changes, it changes by an additional +1 or -1, whichever is more beneficial for you.
additional: If the Resourceful player is a Loyalist, then in most cases, their ability should increase the Cohesion.
If the Resourceful player is a Subversive, then in most cases, their ability should decrease the Cohesion.

name: Secretive
ability: You appear as a different characteristic.

name: Trustworthy
ability: The first time you‚Äôre dismissed, you survive.
